abilities.description: You have an alternate form and a trigger that sparks the transformation. If you encounter or activate the trigger, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} (roll +health) to hasten, endure, or resist the transformation. When you make a move in your alternate form, roll an extra action die. If the move is true to your alternate formâ€™s nature, keep the highest as your action die value. If it is contrary, keep the lowest. To willingly return to your normal form, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.93d2d69b7e2b85e1]{Lose Momentum} (-2).
As above, and when you score a hit with matching values on both action dice, your identities are in harmony; take +1 momentum.
Choose your normal or alternate form as your ideal self. When you change to that form, you are partially restored and may take +1 health or +1 spirit.
